page.title: 16RECREATION-THE VILLAGE FIELD
page.content: The village field is 98m by 74m in length and width.It has a play area with monkey ropes,a swing and some parallel bars.It is used for the football club but they sometimes play cricket.They have the Llanfechain show and the dog shows on it.The play area was built in 1985 by Llanfechain Recreation Association.The field is mowed once a week by Powys County Council the same time as they mow the school field.They are planning on makeing a proper bowling green and tennis courts.The Recreation Association have already built football changing rooms this year.The field belongs to Powys County Council -Education Committee.
